cards.ability: On Reveal: Create four 1-Power Drones at each other location.

cards.name: Uncle Ben
cards.ability: When this card is destroyed, add Spider-Man to your hand.

cards.name: Valkyrie
cards.ability: On Reveal: Set ALL cards at this location to 3 Power.

cards.name: Venom
cards.ability: On Reveal: Destroy your other cards at this location. Add their Power to this card.

cards.name: Vibranium
cards.ability: Ongoing: Can't be destroyed.

cards.name: Viper
cards.ability: On Reveal: Your opponent gains control of one of your other cards at this location.

cards.name: Vision
cards.ability: You can move this each turn.

cards.name: Viv Vision
cards.ability: When you move a card to a location, move this card there as well.

cards.name: Vulture
cards.ability: When this card moves, +5 Power.

cards.name: War Machine
cards.ability: Ongoing: Your 1-Cost cards have +1 Power.

cards.name: Warpath
cards.ability: Ongoing: If any of your locations are empty, +4 Power.

cards.name: Wasp
cards.ability: "My secret power is that I get things done."

cards.name: Wave
cards.ability: On Reveal: All cards cost 4 until the end of next turn.

cards.name: Werewolf By Night
cards.ability: none

cards.name: White Queen
cards.ability: On Reveal: Copy the highest-Cost card in your opponent's hand into your hand.

cards.name: White Tiger
cards.ability: On Reveal: Add a 7-Power Tiger to another location.

cards.name: Widow's Bite
cards.ability: While this is in your hand, you can't draw cards.

cards.name: Winter Soldier
cards.ability: "It's time for me to face the past."

cards.name: Witchfire
cards.ability: On Reveal: Your opponent draws a card, increase its cost by 1.

cards.name: Wolfsbane
cards.ability: On Reveal: +2 Power for each other card you have here.

cards.name: Wolverine
cards.ability: When this is discarded or destroyed, regenerate it at a random location with +2 Power.

cards.name: Wong
cards.ability: Ongoing: Your On Reveal abilities at this location happen twice.

cards.name: X-23
cards.ability: When this is discarded or destroyed, regenerate it at a random location and you get +1 Energy next turn.

cards.name: Yellowjacket
cards.ability: On Reveal: Afflict your other cards at this location with -1 Power.

cards.name: Yo-Yo
cards.ability: When this card moves, move it back with +1 Power.

cards.name: Yondu
cards.ability: On Reveal: Destroy the top card of your opponent's deck.

cards.name: Zabu
cards.ability: Ongoing: Your 4-Cost cards cost 1 less. (minimum 1)

cards.name: Zero
cards.ability: On Reveal: Remove the abilities on the next card you play.
